hero.title: IEL MATHE AG
hero.subtitle: The Club That Makes Math Fun
hero.description: A student club established in 2022 at İstanbul Erkek Lisesi, presenting mathematics not just as a subject, but as an enjoyable and interactive experience.

about.title: About Us
about.visionText: To present mathematics not just as a subject, but as an enjoyable and interactive experience.

events.title: Events and Competitions
events.description: We organize events like Math Day and various competitions to increase students' interest in mathematics.

conferences.title: Conferences and Workshops
conferences.description: We organize various conferences and interactive workshops in Turkish, English, and German with the participation of expert professors in their fields.

articles.title: Article Publications
articles.description: We provide a platform for students to share their scientific work; we offer the opportunity to publish articles in Turkish, English, and German.

social.title: Social Media and Community Interaction
social.description: We actively share on platforms like Instagram and LinkedIn, engaging with mathematics enthusiasts.

education.title: Education and Teaching
education.description: We prepare educational content and teaching materials in the field of mathematics. We offer various resources and materials to improve students' mathematical skills.

research.title: Research Projects
research.description: We carry out various research projects in the field of mathematics. Our students have the opportunity to conduct in-depth research in their areas of interest.

contact.sponsorshipDescription: You can contact our presidents to get information about sponsorship.
